posts.name: Alex
posts.cooked: This assumes only SDS modules… There are other vendors.

posts.name: Jimmy McCosker
posts.cooked: i guess choose the somewhat equivalent ratio to your module

posts.name: Alex
posts.cooked:
Unfortunately it isn’t that simple the WCP swerve has about 5-6 modules on the market with a large amount of variation on gearing. For example the X2i modules have 4 “sets or configurations” each with 3 gearing ratios. Also Rev has there own modules as well. Also what gear ratio are you referring too ? You could be referring to drive ratio or angle/steer ratio.

If your trying to collect real information then i’d figure out a better way to collect these details.

posts.name: Jimmy McCosker
posts.cooked: i mean, i feel like drive ratio is implied tbh
